changeSet.author: Siim Salla
changeSet.sql:
create table vehicle ( id bigserial not null, comodule_id varchar(50), identifier varchar(50), fleet varchar(255) not null, model varchar(255) not null, mileage bigserial, status varchar(255) not null, repo varchar(255) not null, ecu_branch varchar(255) not null, ecu_commit varchar(255) not null, cs_commit varchar(255) not null, created_at timestamp default now() not null, updated_at timestamp default now() not null, deleted_at timestamp );
